A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Poorly written script.  More woman and minorities a good thing\, except they were all made to look bad and incompetent.

Also the Princess Leia Mary Poppins moment was the worst.  New powers in the force\, but with no forshadow!!!

Snoke was a joke\, the story was never explained well\, the casino was a 45 min side trip for no reason except to rescue rats and leave children in slavery.

As a life long star Wars fan I am so disappointed with the mega rich companies destroying everything good.  I usually see Star Wars movies 2 or 3 time in the holidays bringing my whole family.   But once is enough for this garbage.
